catalog_info.title: Introduction to Social Policy Research
catalog_info.notes: Hours to be arranged This course may be taken only for quarter credit.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Limited to first-year PhD students in Social Policy.
catalog_info.description: Required of and limited to first-year PhD students in Social Policy. Explores current issues in Social Policy research based on the Multidisciplinary Program in Inequality & Social Policy Seminar Series.
